<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get the latest Cloud Workload Security policy</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v2/security/cloud_workload/policy/download"}></MethodEndpoint>


The download endpoint generates a Cloud Workload Security policy file from your currently activeCloud Workload Security rules, and downloads them as a .policy file. This file can then be deployed toyour agents to update the policy running in your environment.
